name: Mars Quest
description:
Mars Quest is an adventure, strategy and action game rolled into one. The battle is fought on Mars against armored tanks and robots, and hundreds of mutants attacking human colonies. Become the hero of the rescue mission sent to Mars to protect the colonists from imminent destruction!
You play as a member of the rescue mission, which includes the Ares a satellite war base and landing forces equipend with modern Martian tanks. Unfortunately, during the landing operation on the surface of Mars, the landing ships were shot down. Only your tank survived the attack.
Back up forces can arrive within six months. You are alone. The only support you have is the Ares satellite base.
You are the last hope of colonists! The most difficult mission in human history is ahead of you. Mars Quest is ahead of you!

In the game you drive a special Martian tank equipped with the latest technologies. You can choose from many types of tanks, weapons and additional equipment. Additional support is provided by the Ares orbital base. You can call for orbital support in the form of autonomous guns, bombing, force field generators and more at any time. In this way you can take control over the battlefield and an advantage over the opponents. Good luck commander!
